name: Shenda Zhuoda Coal Mine
company_mentions: 山西云泽能源投资集团 (Shanxi Yunze Energy Investment Group)
山西忻州神达卓达煤业有限公司 (Shanxi Xinzhou Shenda Zhuoda Coal Industry Company)

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/%E5%B1%B1%E8%A5%BF%E5%BF%BB%E5%B7%9E%E7%A5%9E%E8%BE%BE%E5%8D%93%E8%BE%BE%E7%85%A4%E4%B8%9A%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8. The Shenda Zhuoda Coal Mine is an open-pit coal mine with a production capacity of 90 million tons per year, located in Shanxi Province

operators: 山西忻州神达卓达煤业有限公司 (Shanxi Xinzhou Shenda Zhuoda Coal Industry Company)
owners: 山西云泽能源投资集团 (Shanxi Yunze Energy Investment Group)
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanxi Xinzhou Shenda Zhuoda Coal Industry Company, which is fully owned by Shanxi Yunze Energy Investment Group.
